item.title: Publications List
item.description: Please refer to the paper below when publishing results base on simulations with VMC: Reference paper Hřivnáčová I et al: The Virtual MonteCarlo, ECONF C0303241:THJT006,2003; e-Print: cs.SE/0306005 All publications listed in time reversed order: Geant4 VMC 3.0 , I Hřivnáčová, A Gheata 2015 J. Phys.: Conf. Ser. 664 072020 doi: 10.1088 /1742-6596/664/7/072020 The Geant4 Virtual Monte Carlo I Hřivnáčová 2012 J. Phys.: Conf. Ser. 396 022024 doi:10.1088 /1742-6596/119/3/032025 Physics lists in Geant4 VMC
